para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Use a screwdriver and turn the door lock switch from lock the
position with the machine power turned Off to release the door lock and open the door. When the door lock switch is set to
, the door cannot be locked and the machine will not operate even if the the door is closed.
